orderParam.name: ordering
orderParam.description: Order by key name(s), for DESC ordering -created_at or ASC ordering created_at

searchParam.name: search
searchParam.description: Search records by text in multiple text fields

offsetParam.name: offset
offsetParam.description: Specifies the page number of the artists to be displayed

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Limits the number of items on a page

fieldsParam.name: fields
fieldsParam.description: Specifies the fields to show -- field1,field2...

omitExcludeParam.name: omit
omitExcludeParam.description: Specifies the fields to hidden even relation\'s fields -- omitting model fields -> field1,field2... omitting relation\'s fields -> relation_key__relations_model_field

expandParam.name: expand
expandParam.description: Specifies the load relation field details -- field1,field2

message_type.description:
Mesajın hangi konum için oluşturulduğunu tanımlar.  Kullanıcının görmesi gereken bir alan değildir.  Mesaj oluşturulurken mesajın hangi kapsamda olduğunu göstermek için kullanılır `Selectable Values:`
 * `0` - Company Message (Public message for company)
 * `1` - Claim Message (Claim specific message requires `claim`)
 * `2` - Claim Object Message (ClaimObject specific message requires `claim_id` and `claim_object`)
 * `3` - DQC Item Message (Any message for PreSurvey items requires `object_id`)

content_type.description: 'Farklı modeller aracılığı ile oluşturulmuşsa hangi modelden oluştu bilgisini barındırır'

document.description:
Uploaded document url
 * Content must be `file` format while new document creating

document_type.description:
Mesajın hangi konum için oluşturulduğunu tanımlar.  Kullanıcının görmesi gereken bir alan değildir.  Mesaj oluşturulurken mesajın hangi kapsamda olduğunu göstermek için kullanılır `Selectable Values:`
 * `0` - Company Public Document
 * `1` - Claim Document (Claim specific document requires `claim`)
 * `2` - Claim Object Document (ClaimObject specific document requires `claim_id` and `claim_object`)
 * `3` - DQC Item Document (Any document for PreSurvey items requires `object_id`)

content_type.description: 'Farklı modeller aracılığı ile oluşturulmuşsa hangi modelden oluştu bilgisini barındırır'

ModelPermissionContent.description: Content Type object for Model permissions

model.description: Contains model permissions details in object

view.description: True means has access to see model records

add.description: True means has access to create new record to model

change.description: True means has access to update a model record

delete.description: True means has access to delete a model record

view.description: Permission for veiw a record for model

add.description: Permission for create a new record for model

change.description: Permission for update a record for model

delete.description: Permission for delete a record for model

ModelFieldPermissionContent.description: Content Type object for Model permissions

type.description: Field value type of model's field

view.description: True means has access to see model records

change.description: True means has access to update a model record

created_company.description: Reference Key of company. Means: The record created by referenced Company

created_by.description: The record created by referenced User

updated_by.description: Record last ureated by referenced User

is_deleted.description: Is record deleted or not? True is deleted

deleted_by.description: The record deleted by referenced User
